creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Red ground with fine black and white warp ikat stripes, intercepted by two fine white stripes; supplementary weft patterning in green, orange and white rayon arrows; macramé at fringe.
medium: Cotton, rayon; jaspé (ikat) and supplementary weft patterning
title: Man's ceremonial tzute
